= Terraform =

=== State Shenanigans ===
    * If you have existing infrastructure and refactor locally you may need to import existing resources into terraform's state
        * `terraform import module.name.resource.name existing-resource-name`
    * List state
        * `terraform state list`
    * Remove an item from state
        * `terraform state rm module.name.resource.name`
    * God tier multi state remove
        * `terraform state list > temp.txt`
        * remove the items you want to keep and then

{{{bash

    while read line; do
        terraform state rm "$line"
    done <temp.txt

}}}

=== Provider Shenanigans ===
    * List providers
        * `terraform providers`
    * Change provider for existing infra
        * `terraform state replace-provider registry/old registry/new`

=== Resource Targeting ===
    * `terraform apply -target module.name`
